mapper.select: SELECT warehouse_id AS from_wh_id, warehouse_location AS from_location FROM warehouse ORDER BY warehouse_id
SELECT i.prod_id, p.prod_name, i.iv_current_quantity AS current_quantity FROM inventory i JOIN prod p ON i.prod_id = p.prod_id WHERE i.warehouse_id = #{warehouseId} ORDER BY p.prod_name

SELECT warehouse_id AS to_wh_id, warehouse_location AS to_location, warehouse_current, warehouse_scale, (warehouse_scale - warehouse_current) AS remaining_capacity FROM warehouse WHERE warehouse_id != #{fromWhId} ORDER BY warehouse_id
